name: Clicker! FanRemade
description: This is a fan remade of clicker! I drawed everything and coded because i didnt reused the stuff from real game and i cant do that. The coin idea.the transducer and the shop looks was inspiried from Clicker!. But the stuff in the shop and the abilities was my idea. I hope you guys enjoy playing this game and dont forget to play the real Clicker!.
